trans-unit.source: 0.2.0: Added Open Multilingual Wordnet synset as node type and as rel type
trans-unit.target: 0.2.0:增加了开放多语言词网synset作为节点类型和rel类型。

trans-unit.source: 1: We call it describing rather than translating because the output is not anything close to natural language. Rather, it is a mix of symbols and words that conveys the relationships described in the corresponding davar statements.
trans-unit.target: 1：我们称其为描述而不是翻译，因为输出与自然语言没有任何关系。相反，它是符号和单词的组合，传达了相应的davar语句中描述的关系。

trans-unit.source: Note that statements can themselves be nodes in other statements: (Subject1 (Relationship Object Subject2)) is a valid construction.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，语句本身可以是其他语句中的节点： (Subject1 (Relationship Object Subject2)) 是有效的构造。

trans-unit.source: Note: On first run of either the command line tool or the package, around 100mb of data will be downloaded to ./nltk_data in order to allow OMW to be used.
trans-unit.target: 注意：第一次运行命令行工具或软件包时，大约100mb的数据将下载到 ./nltk_data 中，以允许使用OMW。

trans-unit.source: Nodes represent items or ideas, and can currently be Wikidata items, Open Multilingual Wordnet (OMW) synsets, or davar statements, which will be explained later.
trans-unit.target: 节点代表项目或想法，当前可以是Wikidata项目，Open Multilingual Wordnet（OMW）同义词集或davar语句，稍后将对其进行说明。

trans-unit.source: OMW synsets are written using a WordNet locator and offset, ex: 02084071-n.
trans-unit.target: 使用WordNet定位器和偏移量（例如 02084071-n )编写OMW同义词集。

trans-unit.source: Wikidata items are written with Wikidata item identifiers, ex: Q42.
trans-unit.target: Wikidata项目使用Wikidata项目标识符（例如 Q42 )编写。

trans-unit.source: Wikidata properties are written as Wikidata property identifiers, ex: P828
An experimental interpreted international auxiliary language.
trans-unit.target: 一种实验性的口译国际辅助语言。

trans-unit.source: An experimental interpreted international auxilliary language that aims to be extremely easy to translate into other languages, through the use of external databases (currently Wikidata and Open Multilingual Wordnet) for translation strings and very minimal grammar. This package contains both a class for containing writing in davar and describing[1] it in other languages and a command line tool which can do the same.
trans-unit.target: 一种实验性的解释性国际辅助语言，其目的是通过使用外部数据库（当前为Wikidata和Open Multilingual Wordnet）将翻译字符串和极少的语法转换为其他语言，非常容易。该程序包包含一个类，该类包含用davar编写并用其他语言对其进行描述[1]，也可以包含一个可以执行相同操作的命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: Analogy
Citations:
Command Line Tool

Currently there is no reliable way to communicate cross-linguistically. Machine translation tries to solve this, but often runs into fundamental issues explained well here. Rather than by solving that with a constructed auxilliary language like Esperanto or Volapük, davar aims to solve this by creating a notation for simple statements that is language-neutral, and that a computer can easily describe in any language. This is achieved through the minimization of grammar and use of external data sets as a source of translation strings.
trans-unit.target: 当前，没有可靠的跨语言交流方式。机器翻译试图解决这个问题，但是经常会遇到一些基本问题，这里已经很好地解释了。davar并非通过使用诸如世界语或Volapük之类的辅助语言来解决这一问题，而是致力于通过创建一种与语言无关的简单语句的符号来解决这一问题，并且计算机可以轻松地以任何一种语言进行描述。这是通过最小化语法并使用外部数据集作为翻译字符串的源来实现的。

trans-unit.source: Edge
Edges are statements that connect an Subject to an Object :
trans-unit.target: 边是将 Subject 与 Object 连接起来的语句：

trans-unit.source: English Description:
Examples
Fiction:
Footnotes
I am a python programmer.
In the past I went to Unseen University. Now I am employed by Twoflower.
trans-unit.target: 过去我在未央大学上学。现在我在双花公司工作。

trans-unit.source: Labeled Edge
Labeled Edges are statements that connect an Subject to an Object in a way specified by a Relationship :
trans-unit.target: 标记的边是按 Relationship 指定的方式将 Subject 连接到 Object 语句：

trans-unit.source: Meaning:
Nodes
Nodes and rels can be combined to make Statements, of which there are currently three types:
trans-unit.target: 可以将节点和rels组合成Statement，目前有三种类型：

trans-unit.source: Package
Powered by Wikidata.
Purpose
Python → [self → programmer (instance of)]
Rels

Rels represent a specific type of relationship that can be had between nodes, and can currently either be Wikidata properties or OMW synsets. Note that OMW synsets can be both nodes and rels, to allow for flexibility. This may be changed in later releases of davar.
trans-unit.target: Rels表示节点之间可能具有的特定类型的关系，当前可以是Wikidata属性或OMW同义词集。请注意，OMW同义词集既可以是节点又可以是关联，以实现灵活性。在davar的更高版本中，可能会对此进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Self-Description
Singleton Statement
Singleton statements are the most basic type of statement:
trans-unit.target: Singleton语句是最基本的语句类型。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of more complex davar writing:
trans-unit.target: 一些比较复杂的达瓦尔写作的例子。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
The basic building blocks of davar are Nodes and Rels:
The relationship between light and darkness is the same as the relationship between sound and silence.
trans-unit.target: 明与暗的关系与声与静的关系是一样的。

trans-unit.source: To change a string of davar into a Davar object, use d = Davar.from_davartext(davartext) . Then, to describe the Davar object in a readable language, use d.describe(lang) where lang is a string containing a two character language code.
trans-unit.target: 要将davar字符串更改为 Davar 对象，请使用 d = Davar.from_davartext(davartext) 。然后，要以一种可读语言描述 Davar 对象，请使用 d.describe(lang) ，其中 lang 是包含两个字符的语言代码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To describe a string of davar in a language, use
trans-unit.target: 要在语言中描述一串davar,请使用

trans-unit.source: Usage
When it comes to Python, I am a programmer.
Wikidata item and properties can be found by searching Wikidata, and OMW synsets can be found on the OMW search interface.
trans-unit.target: Wikidata项和属性可以通过搜索Wikidata找到，并且OMW同义词集可以在OMW搜索界面上找到。

trans-unit.source: [light → darkness] → [sound → silence] (equal).
and by Open Multilingual Wordnet
davar
davar:
light is to darkness as sound is to silence
nowadays → [self → Twoflower (employer)].
or
previously → [self → Unseen University (attend)].
trans-unit.target: 以前→[自己→看不见的大学（参加）]。

trans-unit.source: where Subject and Object can either be a Node or a Statement and Relationship is a Rel. This statement encodes a specified relationship between the Subject and the Object . For example, (P31 Q42 Q5) will be described in English as Douglas Adams → human (instance of) , which can be understood as "Douglas Adams is a human."
trans-unit.target: 其中 Subject 和 Object 可以是节点或陈述， Relationship 是关系。该语句编码 Subject 和 Object 之间的指定关系。例如， (P31 Q42 Q5) 将用英语描述为 Douglas Adams → human (instance of) ，可以理解为“道格拉斯·亚当斯是人”。

trans-unit.source: where Subject and Object can either be a Node or a Statement. This statement encodes an unspecified relationship between the Subject and the Object . For example, (Q2 00217728-a) will be described in English as Earth → beautiful which can be understood as "there is a relationship between Earth and beauty" or "Earth is beautiful".
trans-unit.target: 其中“ Subject 和“ Object 可以是“节点”或“语句”。该语句编码 Subject 和 Object 之间未指定的关系。例如， (Q2 00217728-a) 将用英语描述为 Earth → beautiful ，它可以理解为“地球与美丽之间存在联系”或“ Earth is beautiful”。

trans-unit.source: where Subject is either a Node or another Statement. This statement is not very meaningful, but means something along the lines of " Subject exists". For example, (Q2013) will be described in English as Wikidata. , which can be understood as "consider Wikidata" or "Wikidata exists."
trans-unit.target: 其中 Subject 是Node或另一个Statement。该陈述不是很有意义，但是意味着类似于“ Subject 存在”的内容。例如， (Q2013) 将以英文描述为 Wikidata. ，可以理解为“考虑Wikidata”或“ Wikidata存在”。

trans-unit.source: where LANG is a two character language code and DAVARTEXT is a string consisting of statements written in davar. This will cause errors if the LANG is in the wrong format or isn't available for the given Wikidata item, which I will get around to handling later.
trans-unit.target: 其中LANG是两个字符的语言代码，DAVARTEXT是由以davar编写的语句组成的字符串。如果 LANG 的格式错误或对于给定的Wikidata项不可用，这将导致错误，我将在稍后处理。
